name: Boss Hog Hickory Smoked Bacon
info: Our best-selling bacon! It's the only bacon you can fry naked.
description: Boss Hog Bacon is hickory smoked and dry cured. Our dry-cured bacon will not shrink like packing house bacon because water isn't added or used in the curing process. We use a time-honored, secret formula and you can certainly tell the difference in taste. Flavorful, thick, and succulent, this bacon is not your average grocery store bacon, which has added water to 'pork up' the weight. We don't add water to our bacon, and no water means no splatter. That's why Bacon Freak bacon is the only bacon you can fry naked! And that's why when you cook a pound of our bacon, you get a pound of bacon! Note: this package contains 14 oz. of uncooked bacon which will yield approximately 14 oz. of cooked bacon. It's 14 oz. of pure bacon awesomeness. Every slice cooks up thick and meaty. Get some! - See more at: http://www.baconfreak.com/boss-hog-style-bacon-hickory-smoked-brown-sugar-cured-pack.html#sthash.dSaO5hiZ.dpuf
additional_info: Usually ships the same business day

name: Boss Hog Honey BBQ Rubbed Bacon
description: Boss Hog Honey BBQ Bacon is coated with our golden honey BBQ rub. We add a special blend of brown sugar, dry honey, and spices to give the bacon a delicious, country BBQ flavor. This bacon is mildly sweet, deliciously savory, and unbelievably tasty. We use the same dry curing process as the Boss Hog Hickory Smoked bacon so you can be sure that it won't shrink like packing house bacon. We've got your sweet and salty cravings covered right here in this bacon. Get your fix of savory goodness now! Seriously, we mean now. - See more at: http://www.baconfreak.com/boss-hog-style-bacon-honey-bbq-rubbed-bacon-pack.html#sthash.II3QsjJ1.dpuf
additional_info: Usually ships the same business day

name: Boss Hog Hickory Smoked Maple Bacon
description: Have you ever dipped a thick, savory strip of bacon in maple syrup? It's extremely delicious, isn't it? That's why we've created this maple-rubbed bacon. Sweet, savory, salty, and irresistible. It's a treat all on its own! So treat yourself to some of this delicious bacon. Trust us, you won't regret it. Tastes delicious with breakfast favorites like French toast, waffles, pancakes and good ol' bacon and eggs. - See more at: http://www.baconfreak.com/boss-hogs-hickory-smoked-maple-bacon-pack.html#sthash.YW9irBWI.dpuf
additional_info: Usually ships the same business day

name: Bacon Freak Maple Bacon Pancake Mix and Bacon Bits
info: The Perfect Breakfast: Fluffy Pancakes Infused with Bacon. Hungry yet?
description: Pancakes are always amplified by bacon. It's probably the perfect breakfast combination. Actually, we think bacon and pancakes are good at any time of the day. However, sometimes we just don't have enough time to make both. So we've created a maple bacon pancake mix! That's right, the pancakes are infused with that savory, salty pork candy! Can it get any better? We didn't think so. (Syrup shown in picture is not included. Please check out our assortment of syrups for sale.) - See more at: http://www.baconfreak.com/bacon-freak-maple-bacon-pancake-mix.html#sthash.lKK1lyTo.dpuf
additional_info: Usually ships the same business day

name: Pancake of the Month Club
info: A fun and convenient way to sample and enjoy selections from our entire spread of pancake mixes - and unlike our competitors - you get 2 flavors of pancake mix delivered each month! Shipping is included in price. - See more at: http://www.baconfreak.com/bacon-freak-pancake-club.html#sthash.ln5CZ8JM.dpuf
description: The Bacon Freak Pancake of the Month Club dips into our entire selection of gourmet waffle and pancake mix so that each time to cook them your meal will be special! Our pancake and waffle mix are batter than the rest! We send you a variety of delicious waffle and pancake mix from some of the best gourmet chefs in town so that you have a delicious breakfast meal delivered to your door! Remember using batter that is better from Bacon Freak.com is a gift that is sure to make you drool!
additional_info: Usually ships the same business day

name: Gourmet Pancake Basket
description: Pancakes are not just a breakfast dish. Granted, most people only eat them in the morning hours; however, the most devout pancake fans feel that pancakes can be eaten at any time of the day! And why not? Especially when you have delicious gourmet pancake mixes to sample, you might just want to make these mouth-watering hotcakes your next dinner. With Baby Bubba's Gourmet Cinnamon and Raisin Pancake Mix, Boss Hog's Oatmeal and Brown Sugar mix, and a Pure Vermont Dark Amber Maple Syrup to drizzle onto these delicious pancake mixes; you'll have any mild pancake admirer yearning for more. Fluffy, golden, and delicious this basket is a perfect gift for anyone.

name: Boss Hog's Maple Bacon Breakfast Blend Tea
info: A Truly Enjoyable Bacon Tea Made with Bacon Freak's Real Maple Bacon Jerky�!
description: Our Maple Bacon Breakfast Blend Tea is a great gift for any bacon lover who wants to explore other realms of bacon goodness. This lapsang souchong black tea is also a unique addition to any tea connoisseur's collection. This black leaf tea is subtly flavored with the taste of maple syrup and bacon flavor that comes from real maple bacon bits. It also has a unique combination of Chai spices like ginger, cardamom, cinnamon and clove. Not only does this tea feature aromatic flavors, it's also made with Bacon Freak's Real Maple Bacon Jerky™! Replace your boring old breakfast tea with this tea that is destined to become your new favorite. Move over, Earl Gray! Whether you drink it with your bacon and eggs, or after dinner with dessert, this tea is delicious all day, any day! - See more at: http://www.baconfreak.com/boss-hogs-maple-bacon-breakfast-blend-tea.html#sthash.BDgVUGuA.dpuf
additional_info: Usually ships the same business day

name: Chocolate Bacon Flavored Tea
description: Chocolate covered bacon has been hitting bacon lovers over the head for years now. The merging of chocolate flavor with savory bacon flavor is an irresistible combination. We've brought this delicious flavor combo to our bacon-inspired Chocolate Bacon Black Tea. Now you can have your caffeine fix while getting your savory sweet bacon chocolate fix! An amazing bacon drink that actually tastes delicious, hot or iced! Each bag contains 2 oz of loose-leaf tea, which will brew 20-25 cups of tea. Simply steep 1 tsp. of tea leaves in 8 oz of boiling water for 4-5 minutes. - See more at: http://www.baconfreak.com/chocolate-bacon-flavored-tea.html#sthash.nmptjqVL.dpuf
additional_info: Usually ships the same business day

name: Gourmet Food Clubs French Market Coffee
description: Smokey, spicy complex blend of our darkest roasts. If you enjoy French Roast, our French Market is an exciting and interesting variation. Fresh Roasted each week for Freshness! Whole Bean. 8 oz bag - See more at: http://www.baconfreak.com/gfc-french-market-coffee.html#sthash.rxOAPES4.dpuf
additional_info: Usually ships the same business day

name: Boss Hog's Bacon Jerky - Sweet & Spicy Style
info: Sweet & Spicy Bacon Jerky in a Resealable Package
description: This jerky is for those who like it sweet and spicy. With a hint of brown sugar, honey and red chili peppers, your favorite Meat Candy is ready to go in a portable, porktastic version. Bacon jerky lets you get your pork fix in whenever, wherever you want it. Bacon Jerky™ is so oinktastic, you shouldn't be limited to one variety. Leave it to a bunch of bacon freaks to be the first company to offer not one but TWO different versions of bacon jerky! We've listened carefully to our customers and created a new Bacon Jerky™ that is different than our other bacon jerky. Just one bite and you'll be in hog heaven! We start with a leaner cut of bacon and cook it longer at a lower temperature to create a bacon jerky that strikes the ideal balance between lean and fat. The result is a bacon jerky with awesome flavor and texture. Just one bite and you'll be in hog heaven!
additional_info: Usually ships the same business day

name: Boss Hog's Bacon Jerky - Red Chili Pepper Style
info: Spicy Red Chili Pepper Bacon Jerky in a Resealable Package
description: Not as hot as our Habanero Heat, this bacon jerky still packs a wallop of spiciness. It's also got a hint of sweetness to balance out the spice. Bacon Jerky lets you get your meat candy fix in wherever you want it. Keep several packs of this delicious jerky stashed at the office, in the car or in your gym bag and be ready for your next bacon craving. The first company that gave you Bacon Jerky™ is now the first company to offer you two distinctly different versions of Bacon Jerky™! We're talkin' bacon innovation here! We've listened to customer feedback and created a new Bacon Jerky™ that is much different than our other bacon jerky. This bacon jerky is leaner than our regular bacon jerky because the special cooking process eliminates most, but not all, of the fat. Because hey, a bit of crispy fat is still desirable in bacon jerky! We use a lean cut of bacon and cook it longer at a lower temperature to create a bacon jerky that strikes the ideal balance between lean and fat.
additional_info: Usually ships the same business day

name: Boss Hog's Bacon Jerky - Habanero Style
info: Flamin' Habanero Bacon Jerky in a Resealable Package
description: Do you like it hot and spicy? Your bacon jerky, that is! (What did you think we were talking about)... Spice up your hiking snacks or afternoon office pick-me-up with this extra-spicy bacon jerky. You'll breathe flames of sweet hot bacon heat with every bite of this awesome jerky. The first company that gave you Bacon Jerky™ is now the first company to offer you two distinctly different versions of Bacon Jerky™! We're talkin' bacon innovation here! We've listened to customer feedback and created a new Bacon Jerky that is different than our other bacon jerky. This bacon jerky is leaner than our regular bacon jerky because the special cooking process eliminates most, but not all, of the fat. Because hey, a bit of crispy fat is still desirable in bacon jerky! We use a lean cut of bacon and cook it longer at a lower temperature to create a bacon jerky that strikes the ideal balance between lean and fat.
additional_info: Usually ships the same business day

name: Boss Hog's Bacon Jerky for Pets (2oz.)
info: Bacon Dog Treats - It's not 'Beggin', it's Bacon!
description: Boss Hog loves his pets Ziggy and Maxwell and so he created an all-natural, 100% bacon pet treat just for them. These Bacon Jerky pet treats are made in a USDA approved facility. Each package is 2 ounces.
additional_info: Usually ships the same business day

name: Bacon Lovin' Dog Stocking
description: Just like their human counterparts, dogs spend all day dreaming about bacon. So it's only appropriate that your precious pet's Christmas stocking be covered in bacon! Strips of bacon adorn a black background, and the cuff of the stocking is a bright holiday red. A green ribbon lets you hang Fido's stocking over the fireplace. These stockings would also be fun for humans. 'Cause we love bacon just as much as Fido! Hanging these bacon stockings will get you a 'Nice' notch in Santa's 'Naughty vs. Nice' ledger.
additional_info: Usually ships the same business day

name: Bacon Lovin' Small Dog Bandana
description: It's no secret that dogs love bacon just as much as their human 'parents'. And if dogs could talk, they'd tell you that they want to show the world just how much they love bacon. With this bacon bandana, you can fulfill your dog's secret wishes. Your favorite four-legged friend will be the coolest pup in the park with this Bacon Bandana. Realistic bacon strips float over a black background. Slide your dog's collar through the bandana sleeve, reattach the collar and ta-da! Fido is transformed into a bona fide bacon freak!
additional_info: Usually ships the same business day
